name: 李老师不是你老师
content:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Kyodo News reported on September 20 that multiple diplomatic sources revealed on the 19th that China will indicate that it will resume importing aquatic products from Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Nikkei Chinese website, during the Beijing Olympics, a large number of Japanese companies entered China. In 2011, the number of Japanese companies in China exceeded 33,000, and in 2012, the number of Japanese people in China exceeded 150,000. However, due to the impact of China's economic stagnation, risk control during the epidemic, and the implementation of the anti-espionage law, Japanese companies accelerated layoffs and factory integration. In 2023, the number of Japanese companies in China will decrease by nearly 10% compared with 2011, and the number of Japanese people in China will also decrease by about 30% compared with 2012. In 2023, Japan's actual direct investment in China will decrease by 15% year-on-year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, Kyodo News and Sohu News reported that surveillance cameras were installed around the Shenzhen Japanese School. The suspect, Zhong, is a 44-year-old male with no fixed job and a criminal record. In 2015, he was released on bail pending trial by the police for suspected destruction of public telecommunications facilities; in 2019, he was detained by the police for allegedly fabricating facts to disrupt public order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, the flowers at the entrance of Shenzhen Japanese School were cleared away. A citizen had just put down the flowers when they were taken away by the security guards standing by. The citizen questioned, "Can you put them down for a while before taking them back? Why do you take away the flowers that everyone gave you?" The security guards put the flowers back to where they were.

content: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: "China and Japan reached a four-point consensus on the issue of the discharge of wastewater from the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant into the sea"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said that the consensus reached between China and Japan on the issue of sewage discharge into the sea is not related to the murder of the Japanese boy in Shenzhen. The consensus document reached between China and Japan does not mean that the import of Japanese aquatic products will be fully resumed immediately.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the high-performance GPGPU design company "Xiangdixian" in Chongqing, which was known as the "Chinese version of Nvidia", was exposed to be in a dissolution storm, with 400 employees unemployed and owed tens of millions of yuan in wages. The entire company is dormant. According to Phoenix Technology, the company had more than 800 employees at its peak, and there were more than 400 employees left before the current storm broke out.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the incident of "the deputy county magistrate of Ye County, Henan Province, forcibly demolishing a university student's entrepreneurial orchard" has sparked heated discussions. Some netizens discovered that the resume of Ye County Deputy County Magistrate Hu Weizhe showed that he had entered the Xinhua District People's Congress at the age of 14. Currently, the official's resume has been changed to show that he started working at the age of 17.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to South Korean media reports, several North Korean sources said that after China recently increased pressure on North Korea, "Kim Jong-un recently called China an old enemy, and in July he also told diplomats stationed in China not to "look at China's face." He also did not send a delegation to participate in the 97th anniversary of the founding of the Chinese army.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Hezbollah walkie-talkie exploded in Lebanon, killing 20 and injuring 450. In response, Chinese netizens said, "Domestic products are the safest," "Supporting domestic products can really save lives at critical moments!" "It's still safer to use Huawei."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, netizens discovered that the comment section of the Shenzhen Japanese School in the AutoNavi map software was full of anti-Japanese and xenophobic comments. Now, the comment section has been cleared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 20 (Released), netizens submitted a post saying that recently someone photographed police officers in a certain place posing for photos. In order to create an image of hard work, they sprinkled water on their backs to fake sweat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, China and Japan reached an agreement on the discharge of treated water from the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. The two countries agreed to relax the embargo on Japanese seafood and expand monitoring of treated water from nuclear power plants. The announcement was made by Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida in a telephone conversation with IAEA Director General Grossi. China has begun to adjust import control measures and gradually resume imports of Japanese seafood that meet standards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 19 (Released) In Xiangtan, Hunan, several primary school students beat up a fake model dressed as a Japanese soldier on the street.

What frustrates him is that in the United States, his vote sometimes does not count.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Gradually resume imports of Japanese aquatic products that meet regulations. A large number of netizens expressed dissatisfaction with the government's approach. Netizens replied, "This makes me feel that the previous boycott was a joke," "The Ministry of Commerce will eat first," and "This is what happened just after 918. Don't you take the common people seriously?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 20, Chongqing. A man posted a video saying that he thought as long as he didn't steal or rob, didn't worship foreigners or sell out his country, he would be a good citizen, but as long as he was a farmer, he would do illegal things every day. For example: burning straw is illegal, cutting down trees that you planted is illegal, selling loofahs that you planted is illegal because you don't have the necessary procedures, building a toilet is illegal, setting off firecrackers during the New Year is illegal, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 20, the Consulate General of Japan in Guangzhou stated that the Shenzhen Japanese School has received more than 1,000 bouquets of flowers from all walks of life. Considering the hot weather in Guangzhou, the school has placed the bouquets in the air-conditioned flower donation room. The bouquets of condolences and messages have been conveyed to the bereaved family one after another.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The father of the child who died in the Shenzhen attack wrote a letter. The letter mentioned that Hangping's (the stabbed boy) mother is Chinese and his father has lived in China for decades. His father said that they do not hate China and Japan, and do not want the crimes of a very small number of despicable people with twisted ideas to damage the relationship between the two countries. He hopes that such a tragedy will not happen again.
